summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3721 for the improvement of 59th Avenue Southwest, from Alki Avenue to West Hanford Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45696, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
